title: Evgeni Yanchovski
text:
Evgeni Valev Yanchovski (; born 5 September 1939) is a <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>n former <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player and manager.
Yanchovski represented <a href="Bulgaria%20national%20football%20team">Bulgaria</a> at the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for Bulgaria at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
At club level he played for Levski Karlovo and subsequently <a href="Beroe%20Stara%20Zagora">Beroe Stara Zagora</a> from 1960 to 1974, where he appeared in 341 matches and scored 31 goals.
As a manager, he led Beroe to the championship title in the <a href="Bulgarian%20A%20PFG">Bulgarian A PFG</a> in 1986.
